dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-jinja2
dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependent_to.name: py-dask-glm
dependent_to.description:
Dask-glm is a library for fitting Generalized Linear Models on large
datasets.

dependent_to.name: py-elephant
dependent_to.description: Elephant is a package for analysis of electrophysiology data in Python

dependent_to.name: py-deeptools
dependent_to.description:
deepTools addresses the challenge of handling the large amounts of data
that are now routinely generated from DNA sequencing centers.
